updateSqlList: CREATE TABLE `Cooperation_TaskSubmit` (`autoId` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strProjectCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strTaskCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strUserCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`dtSubmitTime` DATETIME NOT NULL,`strSubmitDescription` VARCHAR(2000),`latest` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strSubmitFiles` VARCHAR(20000),PRIMARY KEY (`autoId`))ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `Cooperation_TaskSubmit` (`autoId` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strProjectCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strTaskCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strUserCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`dtSubmitTime` DATETIME NOT NULL,`strSubmitDescription` VARCHAR(2000),`latest` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strSubmitFiles` VARCHAR(20000),PRIMARY KEY (`autoId`))ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE Cooperation_TaskSubmit (autoId VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strProjectCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strTaskCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strUserCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,dtSubmitTime date NOT NULL,strSubmitDescription VARCHAR2(2000),latest varchar2(10) NOT NULL,strSubmitFiles VARCHAR2(4000),PRIMARY KEY (autoId))
